short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get answers from favorite websites with every google search

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Sites like Reddit and Quora have more diverse answers to your question, answered by different people with distinctive opinion and experiences. You are better server by perspectives and knowledge of millions of people on the internet rather than a sole blogger, to satisfy your curiosity.

This is what KeyMark extension/add-on does. The extension aggregates answers from your favorite websites and shows it along side google search results. This way every time you search on google, you get posts from your favorite websites.
